statements: SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT sleep_date, sleep_duration FROM sleep_patterns WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT sleep_duration, light_exposure FROM sleep_patterns WHERE sleep_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, sleep_duration, light_exposure FROM sleep_patterns ORDER BY sleep_duration DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM sleep_patterns WHERE light_exposure > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY sleep_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, sleep_duration FROM sleep_patterns WHERE sleep_duration > 7 ORDER BY sleep_duration ASC;
SELECT sleep_date, AVG(sleep_duration) AS avg_duration FROM sleep_patterns GROUP BY sleep_date HAVING AVG(sleep_duration) > 6;
SELECT user_id, SUM(sleep_duration) AS total_duration FROM sleep_patterns GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_duration DESC;
SELECT user_id, sleep_date, sleep_duration, light_exposure FROM sleep_patterns WHERE light_exposure BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0 ORDER BY user_id, sleep_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT sleep_start, sleep_end FROM sleep_patterns WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE sleep_start >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, sleep_start, sleep_end FROM sleep_patterns WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY sleep_start DESC;
SELECT algorithm_id, algorithm_type FROM lighting_algorithms ORDER BY algorithm_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, sleep_start, sleep_end FROM sleep_patterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE sleep_end > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT algorithm_id, algorithm_type FROM lighting_algorithms WHERE optimization_goal = 'energy efficient' ORDER BY algorithm_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM sleep_patterns;
SELECT algorithm_id, algorithm_type, optimization_goal FROM lighting_algorithms WHERE algorithm_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns ORDER BY sleep_start DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, user_id, sleep_start FROM sleep_patterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM ai_algorithms ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, user_id, light_intensity, color_scheme FROM smart_home_lighting WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE sleep_end < NOW();
SELECT * FROM sleep_patterns WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, algorithm_name FROM ai_algorithms WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, sleep_start, sleep_end FROM sleep_patterns WHERE sleep_start BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, light_intensity FROM smart_home_lighting ORDER BY light_intensity DESC;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_lighting WHERE user_id = 3 AND color_scheme = 'Warm White';
SELECT * FROM sleep_data;
SELECT user_id, sleep_start, sleep_quality FROM sleep_data WHERE sleep_quality > 3;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM user_profile WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, lighting_start_time, lighting_end_time FROM lighting_schedule WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, rhythm_type, rhythm_start, rhythm_end FROM circadian_rhythm ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, sleep_start, sleep_end, sleep_quality FROM sleep_data;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, rhythm_type, rhythm_start, rhythm_end FROM circadian_rhythm WHERE user_id = 1001 AND rhythm_type = 'morning';
SELECT * FROM lighting_schedule WHERE lighting_start_time < '08:00:00' AND lighting_end_time > '20:00:00';
SELECT user_id, username, age, gender FROM user_profile JOIN circadian_rhythm ON user_profile.user_id = circadian_rhythm.user_id;
SELECT * FROM sleep_data;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM user_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT pattern_name, optimal_lighting_intensity FROM sleep_patterns ORDER BY optimal_lighting_intensity DESC;
SELECT user_id, light_brightness, light_color FROM light_settings WHERE light_brightness > 50;
SELECT user_id, waking_time, sleeping_time, activity_level FROM circadian_rhythms WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_name, age, gender FROM user_info WHERE gender='Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, recommended_color FROM sleep_patterns WHERE optimal_lighting_intensity > 50 ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
SELECT user_name, sleep_start, sleep_end, hours_slept FROM user_info INNER JOIN sleep_data ON user_info.user_id = sleep_data.user_id;
SELECT user_name, waking_time, sleeping_time, activity_level FROM user_info INNER JOIN circadian_rhythms ON user_info.user_id = circadian_rhythms.user_id WHERE activity_level='High';
